basnahiren krushi nawodayak yana themawa yatathe basnahira palath krushikarma departhamenthuwa sanwidhanaya kala krushikarma pa්rawardhana sathiya eeye awasan wiya.krushi wyawasayakathwaya kerehi nawa parapura nambauru kirimath nagarika krushikarmaya janathawa atharata gena yamath aramunu karagena pawathwunu ema pa්rawardhana sathiye nagarika krushikarmaya, kompost nishpadanaya, pas aswanu haniya awama kirima, deshiya aahara pa්rachalitha kirima pilibanda danuwath kirime wadamulu da pawathwini.palatha thula samaja aarthika ha parisarika thaththwayanata yogya thirasara krushikarmika sanwardhanaya padaka kotagath wyapthi ha puhunu ki්rayadamayan krushikarmaye niratha wuwan sandaha pawathwagena yama basnahira palath krushikarma departhamenthuwe karya bharaya athara pa්radhana we.palath krushikarma adhyakshawarayaku yatathe palanaya wana paripalana eekaka 9 kin samanwitha basnahira krushikarma departhamenthuwe wyapruthi katayuthu disa mattamin meheyawanu labanne niyojya saha sahakara adhyakshawarunge adhikshanaya yatathe pa්radeshiya mattamin pihiti gowijana sewa madhyasthanawalata anubaddha krushi upadeshaka karyala 54 k wisini.tharuna, wadihiti kantha saha gowijanathawata awashya puhunu katayuthu disa mattamin pahatha athi walpita, ambaepussa, homagama, horana krushikarma puhunu madhyasthana magin sidu kere.disa thunata adala rathmalana, kalaniya, kaluthara pihiti krushikarma thorathuru huwamaru madhyasthana 3 k niyojya palath krushikarma adhyakshawarunge adhikshanayen gowi janathawage awashyathawa itu kirima sandaha ki්rayathmaka wethi.bhumiya sima wima hethuwen disa thune ma nagarika ha ardha nagarika pa්radeshawala adu ida ha ida nathi janathawa ilakka kara ganimin piyasi wagawan ha pala ropitha wagawan handunwadi thibima wisheshathwayaki.palathe wadi idakadak wenwa aththe kesel walataya.
